mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.chuangwei_id as chuangweiId ,a.yonghu_id as yonghuId ,a.chaungweishenqing_yesno_types as chaungweishenqingYesnoTypes ,a.chaungweishenqing_yesno_text as chaungweishenqingYesnoText ,a.update_time as updateTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,chuangwei.chuangwei_name as chuangweiName ,chuangwei.chuangwei_address as chuangweiAddress ,chuangwei.chuangwei_types as chuangweiTypes ,yonghu.yonghu_name as yonghuName ,yonghu.yonghu_photo as yonghuPhoto ,yonghu.yonghu_phone as yonghuPhone ,yonghu.yonghu_email as yonghuEmail ,yonghu.yisheng_id as yonghuYishengId ,yonghu.yonghu_delete as yonghuDelete
FROM chaungweishenqing a left JOIN chuangwei chuangwei ON a.chuangwei_id = chuangwei.id left JOIN yonghu yonghu ON a.yonghu_id = yonghu.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and ( a.chuangwei_id = #{params.chuangweiId} )
and ( a.yonghu_id = #{params.yonghuId} )
and a.chaungweishenqing_yesno_types = #{params.chaungweishenqingYesnoTypes}
and a.chaungweishenqing_yesno_text like CONCAT('%',#{params.chaungweishenqingYesnoText},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.update_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.updateTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.update_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.updateTimeEnd})
and a.chuangwei_id IS NOT NULL
and chuangwei.chuangwei_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.chuangweiName},'%')
and chuangwei.chuangwei_address like CONCAT('%',#{params.chuangweiAddress},'%')
and chuangwei.chuangwei_types = #{params.chuangweiTypes}
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(chuangwei.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(chuangwei.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.yonghu_id IS NOT NULL
and yonghu.yonghu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuName},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuPhone},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuEmail},'%')
and yonghu.yisheng_id = #{params.yishengId}
and yonghu.yonghu_delete >= #{params.yonghuDeleteStart}
and yonghu.yonghu_delete <= #{params.yonghuDeleteEnd}
and yonghu.yonghu_delete = #{params.yonghuDelete}
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(yonghu.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(yonghu.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
